EmailTemplate.name: VMworld VIP Cocktail Party.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Invitation to Chill: VIP Cocktail Reception with VMTurbo Following VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
After a long and fun-filled day at VMWorld, unwind over cocktails and conversation in a relaxed setting with VMTurbo and a select group of fellow VIPs.
Join us at San Franciscoâ€™s Twenty Five Lusk restaurant & lounge on Monday, August 26, 6:00PM-8:00PM.
Please click here <http://go.vmturbo.com/VMworld_VIP_Cocktail_Party_RSVP.html> to RSVP by August 19. We look forward to seeing you.
Sincerely,
{{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=The VMTurbo Team}} {{lead.Lead Owner Last Name:default=edit me}} Email: {{lead.Lead Owner Email Address:default=sales@vmturbo.com}} Phone: {{lead.Lead Owner Phone Number:default=(781) 373-3540}}
-----------------------------------------------------------------
VMTurbo VIP Cocktail Reception Monday, August 26 6:00 PM-8:00 PM 25 Lusk - 25 Lusk St, San Francisco, CA 94107
And during the event, stop by booth #611 and show off your skills on our surf simulator. Get your license to chill!
